abstract: Amazon.com has agreed to buy Shelfari, the social-networking site for bibliophiles announced in a company blog post Monday night.
snippet: Amazon.com has agreed to buy Shelfari, the social-networking site for bibliophiles announced in a company blog post Monday night.
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com has agreed to buy Shelfari, the social-networking site for bibliophiles announced in a company blog post Monday night.
